# Flood phenomena in Europe
## Streamgraph

```{r, out.width="60%", fig.align="center", fig.cap="Photo by Jonathan Ford on Unsplash"}

masthead <- "assets/jonathan-ford-unsplash.jpg"
knitr::include_graphics(masthead, dpi=72)

```

***

### Ingest
#### country, year, number of tests


```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/flood-phenomena-in-europe/flood-phenomena-in-europe.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
df

```


### Wrangle
#### enrich with other country attributes


```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df_wrangle <- df
df_wrangle$iso3c <- countrycode(df$cc, origin = 'iso2c', destination = 'iso3c') 
df_wrangle$country_name <- countrycode(df_wrangle$iso3c, origin = 'iso3c', destination = 'country.name') 
df_wrangle$region <- countrycode(df_wrangle$iso3c, origin = 'iso3c', destination = 'un.regionsub.name') 

df_wrangle <- df_wrangle %>% drop_na(iso3c)
df_wrangle

#unique(df_wrangle$iso3c)
#unique(df_wrangle$region)

```


### Streamgraph
#### color by sub region


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "bottom",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text.y = element_blank(),
  axis.line.y = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  # panel.grid = element_blank(),
  # panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
)

# "Southern Europe" "Western Europe"  "Eastern Europe"  "Western Asia"    "Northern Europe"
code_pal <- c("Southern Europe" = "#BBCCEE",
              "Western Europe" = "#CCEEFF",
              "Eastern Europe" = "#EEEEBB",
              "Western Asia" = "#FFCCCC",
              "Northern Europe" = "#DDDDDD")

v1 <- ggplot(data = df_wrangle, aes(x = year, y = count, group = iso3c, fill = region, color = region)) +
  stat_steamgraph() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1980, 1985, 1990, 1995, 2000, 2005, 2010, 1980, 1985, 1990, 1995, 2000, 2005, 2010, 2015)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = code_pal ) +
  scale_color_manual(values = code_pal ) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL)

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```
